original_text: but my steadfast love will not depart from him, as I took it from Saul, whom I put away from before you.
korean_text: 내가 네 앞에서 물러나게 한 사울에게서 내 은총을 빼앗은 것처럼 그에게서 빼앗지는 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: but my steadfast love will not depart from him
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나의 한결같은 사랑은 그에게서 떠나지 않으리라

sentences.original_text: as I took it from Saul
whom I put away from before you
